clear.description: Are you sure you want to remove the attachment of this challenge?
clear.title: Clear Attachment

instruction.amount_double: It is recommended to upload dynamic attachments that are twice the expected number of participating teams.

dynamic.content: Batch upload dynamic attachments, all of which will be distributed with the same file name.
dynamic.format: Please use each flag as the file name for the corresponding attachment.

remote.content: Batch set remote attachments and corresponding flags, with one group per line.
remote.format: Please separate the flag and the URL with a space.

attachment_name.description: All dynamic attachments will be downloaded under this filename
attachment_name.label: Global Attachment Name

bonus.description: The Triple Blood Bonus refers to the additional points awarded when a challenge is solved by the first three teams. Each team can receive a scoring bonus based on the current points of the challenge. The bonus will be added to the team's score in the form of a fixed percentage.

challenges.delete: Are you sure you want to delete challenge {{name}}?
challenges.disable: Are you sure you want to disable challenge {{name}}?

empty.description: Click the top right to create the first challenge
empty.title: Ouch! This game has no challenge yet.

challenges.enable: Are you sure you want to enable challenge {{name}}?

flag.create:
Create flags. Multiple flags should be separated by lines, one flag per line.
Each challenge can have multiple flags. Any configured flags can be accepted.
flag.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this flag?

empty.description: Please add flag via top right corner
empty.title: The flag list is empty

instructions.both: If you need to enable leet flag with <1>[TEAM_HASH], add the <2>[LEET] tag before the flag template string. The entropy of the flag template string will not be checked.
instructions.description: Please enter flag template string, leave it blank to generate random GUID as flag
instructions.guid: Specify <1>[GUID]</1> to replace only placeholder here with random GUID
instructions.leet: Leet String will be enabled if <1>[TEAM_HASH]</1> is not specified and will change strings in braces based on the template. Please make sure the entropy of flag template string is high enough.
instructions.team_hash: If <1>[TEAM_HASH]</1> is specified, it will be automatically replaced with the hash generated by team token and contest's information

flag.title: Flag Management

challenges.title: Title

traffic_capture.description: Capturing the traffic when the team solves challenges. Platform proxy needs to be enabled
traffic_capture.label: Enable Traffic Capture

container_limit.description: Containers shared by one team (0 = unlimited)
container_limit.label: Team Container Limit

info.delete: Are you sure you want to delete game {{name}}?

invite_code.description: Leave empty for no invitation code
invite_code.label: Invitation Code

organizations.description: Add divisions to enable grouped scoreboard, leave empty to disable
organizations.label: List of Participating Divisions

practice_mode.description: View challenges after the game ends
practice_mode.label: Practice Mode

summary.description: Will be displayed in the game list
summary.label: Summary

title.description: Excessive length may affect the display effect
title.label: Title

writeup_deadline.description: Hours to submit writeups after game ends
writeup_deadline.label: Writeup Deadline

notices.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this notice?

empty.description: Click on the top right button to create a new notice
empty.title: No notice yet
Ouch! No teams have joined this game yet

instances.destroy: Are you sure you want to destroy instance {{name}}?
instances.note: Note: Container statistics do not include admin test container and destroyed container

content.markdown_inline_support: Styling with inline Markdown is supported

allow_register.description: Allow users to register new accounts
allow_register.label: Allow Register

auto_active.description: Whether to activate users after registered
auto_active.label: Auto-activate

email_confirmation_required.description: Whether user verification email is required
email_confirmation_required.label: Email Verification Required

email_domain_list.description: List of allowed email domains to register. Separate multiple domains with commas, leave empty to disable.
email_domain_list.label: Email Domain Whitelist

auto_destroy.description: Whether to auto-destroy the old instance when meets the limit
auto_destroy.label: Auto-destroy Old Instances

default_lifetime.description: The default lifetime of the container
default_lifetime.label: Default Lifetime (min)

extension_duration.description: The duration of each renewal of the container
extension_duration.label: Renewal Duration (min)

renewal_window.description: The time window before the container expires to renew
renewal_window.label: Renewal Window (min)

footer.description:
Supports Markdown syntax, will be replaced with
on mobile device

name.description: Platform name will be displayed with ::CTF
name.label: Platform Name

slogan.description: Will be displayed at the top of the page
slogan.label: Platform Slogan

teams.lock: Are you sure you want to {{action}} team {{name}} ?

users.delete: Are you sure you want to delete user {{name}} ?

reset.content: The user password has been reset, this password will only show up once, please save it properly.
